title: Accessory after the fact
context: [ยง124A-113] Accessory after the fact. Any person subject to this chapter who, knowing that an offense punishable by this chapter has been committed, receives, comforts, or assists the offender in order to hinder or prevent the offender&rsquo;s apprehension, trial, or punishment shall be punished as a court-martial may direct. [L 1982, c 171, pt of ยง2; gen ch 1985]
